room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Game Cincinnati in Cincinnati
room_address: 28 W Freedom Way Suite 300 Cincinnati, OH 45202
room_description: Get ready for an exciting challenge of beating a thief at his own game. A famous piece of artwork has gone missing and it is up to your covert team to recover the invaluable masterpiece. If you succeed in your mission you will become national heroes! If you fail, you will be treated as a common criminal by the authorities. Good luck!
